Module org.nasdanika.drawio
Package org.nasdanika.drawio

Interface Layer

All Superinterfaces:
Element, Element, Marked, ModelElement, PropertySource<String,String>
All Known Subinterfaces:
Node
public interface Layer extends ModelElement
A diagram may have one or more layers.
Author:
Pavel
